channel.title: Anton A. Jerey
channel.description: Recent content on Anton A. Jerey

item.title: About
item.description: Who I am a software developer from Salzburg/Austria and currently working in Bavaria as a C++ software engineer for BSH Homeappliances. Hobbies I enjoy travelling around the world, going for a mountain bike ride or for a nice hike in the mountains of this area. Further, I also enjoy programming in my spare time. Usually I come up with a project idea and then try to solve it with various technologies.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to get in touch, please write to contact@jerey.at.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Following some projects I have been working on in my spare time. Python Picture-to-Text Problem Solution Drawback Used technologies Weatherstation Idea Setup Client Server Node JS Server Node Red, InfluxDB and Grafana Used technologies Coffee Grinder Automation Idea Goal Solution Used technologies Python Picture-to-Text A python tool used to extract text from images. For a more detailed view, see the repository.
